# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported |
|---------|-----------|
| latest  | Yes       |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability in this project, please report it responsibly.

**Do not open a public issue.** Instead, use [GitHub Private Vulnerability Reporting](https://github.com/caitlon/BeCoMe/security/advisories/new) to submit your report.

You can expect an initial response within 72 hours. We will work with you to understand the scope of the issue and develop a fix before any public disclosure.
